member.name: T:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfiguration
member.summary: Specifies the configuration of a file system crawl.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfiguration.Root
member.summary: Gets the starting subdirectory for the configured subdirectory crawl.
member.value: The root subdirectory of the configured subdirectory crawl.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfiguration.Logs
member.summary: Gets the crawl log entries.
member.value: The crawl log entries.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.Id
member.summary: Gets the primary key value.
member.value: The unique identifier used as the current entity's primary key the database.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets the display name.
member.value: The display name for the current crawl configuration.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.MaxRecursionDepth
member.summary: Gets the maximum recursion depth.
member.value: The maximum sub-folder recursion depth, where a value less than 1 only crawls the root , a value will crawl 1 sub-folder deep, and so on.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.MaxTotalItems
member.summary: Gets the maximum total items to crawl.
member.value: The maximum total items to crawl, including both files and subdirectories.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.TTL
member.summary: Gets the maximum duration of the crawl.
member.value: The maximum duration of the crawl, in seconds. This value should never be less than 60.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.Notes
member.summary: Gets the custom notes.
member.value: The custom notes to associate with the current crawl configuration.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.StatusValue
member.summary: Gets a value indicating current crawl configuration status.
member.value: The value that indicates the current status.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.LastCrawlStart
member.summary: Gets the date and time when the last crawl was started.
member.value: The date and time when the last crawl was started or if no crawl hhas ever been started for this configuration.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.LastCrawlEnd
member.summary: Gets the date and time when the last crawl was finshed.
member.value: The date and time when the last crawl was finshed; otherwise, if the current crawl is still active or if no crawl has ever been started for this configuration.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.NextScheduledStart
member.summary: Gets the date and time when the next true is to begin.
member.value: The date and time when the next crawl is to begin or if there is no scheduled crawl.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.RescheduleInterval
member.summary: Gets the length of time between automatic crawl re-scheduling.
member.value: The length of time between automatic crawl re-scheduling, in seconds or to disable automatic re-scheduling.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.RescheduleFromJobEnd
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether automatic rescheduling is calculated from the completion time of the previous job, versus the start time.

member.name: P:FsInfoCat.Local.CrawlConfigurationRow.RescheduleAfterFail
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether crawl jobs are automatically rescheduled even if the previous job failed.
member.value: if crawl jobs are always automatically re-scheduled; otherwise, if crawl jobs are automatically re-scheduled only if the preceding job did not fail.
